experience.title: Full-Stack Developer

achievements_star.situation: Need for responsive and efficient UI components across 5 client projects with inconsistent codebases

achievements_star.result: Enhanced load speed by 35%, improved user satisfaction metrics by 28%, reduced component development time by 50% through reusability
achievements_star.team_collaboration: Mentored 2 junior developers on React best practices and TypeScript patterns

achievements_star.situation: Manual deployment process taking 4+ hours and causing production errors, affecting 5 client deployments per week
achievements_star.task: Automate deployment process to reduce time and eliminate human error
achievements_star.action: Built comprehensive CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions with automated testing, linting, type-checking, and multi-environment deployments. Implemented rollback strategies and deployment notifications

quantified_impact.team_productivity: Freed 10 hours per week of developer time

projects_portfolio.name: Job Tracker ‚Äî Full-Stack Job Application Management
projects_portfolio.description:
Job Tracker is a modern, full-stack job application management system designed to help job seekers organize, track, and optimize their job search. Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Prisma, and Tailwind CSS, it provides a clean, responsive, and interactive interface for managing applications, analytics, and document uploads.

Core Features: Application Management, Smart Analytics Dashboard, Document Management, Secure Authentication, Public Sharing, Follow-up Reminders, Responsive UI, Real-time Updates, Dark Mode Ready.
Tech Stack: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Prisma ORM + PostgreSQL, NextAuth.js, Vercel Blob Storage, Vercel Analytics, ESLint, SOLID Principles, Service Pattern.
Mission: Simplify and optimize the job search process.
Live Demo: https://job-tracker-zeta-wheat.vercel.app

projects_portfolio.name: GenZ Memories ‚Äî Social Video Platform
projects_portfolio.description:
GenZ Memories is a modern social media platform built to preserve Gen Z activism and social movements through short-form videos and storytelling. Developed using Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Prisma, it combines the sleek feel of TikTok with the mission of documenting social impact.

Core Features: Video Upload & Sharing, Engagement System, Discovery Feed, Custom Profiles, Admin Dashboard, Real-time Notifications & Chat, Modern UI/UX, AI Roadmap (Upcoming).
Tech Stack: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Prisma ORM + PostgreSQL, NextAuth.js v5, Cloudinary, Socket.io, FFmpeg, Radix UI, Shadcn UI, Vercel Analytics.
Mission: Archive voices of change.
Live Demo: https://genz-memories.vercel.app

projects_portfolio.name: PDFly ‚Äî Smart PDF Management Platform
projects_portfolio.description:
PDFly is a next-generation web-based PDF management tool built with Next.js 15, allowing users to efficiently compress, merge, split, convert, and secure their PDF files through a simple and intuitive interface.

Key Features: Fast Performance, Secure Processing, Multi-Tool Support, AI Assistant (Coming Soon), Light/Dark Mode.
Tech Stack: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Shadcn UI, Node.js (API Routes), Prisma ORM, PostgreSQL, PDF-Lib, Sharp, Vercel.
Objective: Simplify document handling for everyone.
Live Demo: https://pdf-fast-fly.vercel.app/

projects_portfolio.name: BrainiX - AI-Powered E-Learning Platform
projects_portfolio.description:
BrainiX is a next-generation AI-powered e-learning platform designed to revolutionize online education through personalized, intelligent, and interactive learning experiences. Built using Next.js 14, TypeScript, Prisma, and PostgreSQL.

Key Highlights: Personalized Learning, Smart Assessments, Secure Payments, Real-Time Communication, Course Management, Student Dashboard, Modern Design, Authentication.
Tech Stack: Next.js 14, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Node.js (API Routes), Prisma ORM, PostgreSQL, Clerk, Stripe, Shadcn/UI, Radix UI.
Objective: Create an all-in-one educational ecosystem.
Live Demo: https://braini-x-one.vercel.app

projects_portfolio.name: HTML Editor Pro
projects_portfolio.description:
HTML Editor Pro is a modern, feature-rich HTML, CSS, and JavaScript editor with real-time preview, syntax highlighting, and beautiful UI design.

Core Features: Real-time Preview, Multi-tab Editor, Dark/Light Theme, Responsive Design, Fast Performance, Monaco Editor Integration, Syntax Highlighting, One-click Copy, Download Export, Reset Functionality, Fullscreen Mode, Glass Morphism, Gradient Accents, Smooth Animations, Interactive Elements, Clean Layout.
Tech Stack: Next.js 15.5.4, React 19.1.0, TypeScript 5, Tailwind CSS 4, Framer Motion, Lucide React, Monaco Editor, Next Themes, ESLint, Turbopack.
Live Demo: https://html-editor-pro-six.vercel.app/

projects_portfolio.name: Markdown to PDF Converter
projects_portfolio.description:
Markdown to PDF Converter is a modern, feature-rich Markdown editor with live preview and PDF export capabilities.

Core Features: Real-time Preview, PDF Export, Monaco Editor, GitHub-style Rendering, Secure, Responsive Design, Fast & Modern, Smart Filename Generation, Beautiful UI.
Tech Stack: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript 5, Tailwind CSS 4, GitHub Markdown CSS, Glassmorphism Design, Monaco Editor, Marked.js 15, DOMPurify, Remark GFM, html2pdf.js.
Live Demo: https://markdown-to-pdf-preview.vercel.app/

projects_portfolio.name: SangeetX ‚Äì A Modern Music Streaming Experience
projects_portfolio.description:
SangeetX is a modern, full-featured music streaming platform that provides both guest and authenticated experiences. Built with Next.js 15 and React 19, it offers a comprehensive solution for music discovery, playback, and management.

Key Highlights: Modern UI/UX, Full-Stack Solution, Real-time Features, Mobile-First, Admin Dashboard, Guest Experience.
Tech Stack: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript 5, Tailwind CSS 4, Lucide React, Clerk, PostgreSQL, Prisma ORM, Cloud Storage Integration, Turbopack, ESLint, Prisma Studio.
Live Demo: https://www.sangeetx.online

projects_portfolio.name: ChatSphere
projects_portfolio.description:
ChatSphere is a real-time chat application built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and Socket.io for instant messaging. It enables users to register, log in, and chat with friends in real-time. The app supports private messaging, group chats, media sharing, and user authentication with JWT.

Features: Real-Time Messaging, User Authentication, One-on-One & Group Chats, Media & File Sharing, Modern & Responsive UI, Online/Offline Status Indication.
Tech Stack: React.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Socket.io, JWT, bcrypt.js, Render.
Live Demo: https://chatsphere-p8zu.onrender.com/welcome

projects_portfolio.name: Product Store
projects_portfolio.description:
Product Store is a full-stack e-commerce store project built using pnpm, Vite, React (frontend), Node.js (backend), and MongoDB (database).

Features: Frontend with React and Zustand, Backend with Node.js, Database with MongoDB.
Showcases core full-stack development skills and typical e-commerce features.
Live Preview: https://product-store-m4ol.onrender.com

projects_portfolio.name: My Weather App (Mausam) üå¶Ô∏è
projects_portfolio.description:
My Weather App (Mausam) is a real-time weather app built with Next.js, React.js, TypeScript, TanStack Query, Shadcn UI, Recharts, and Tailwind CSS.

Key Features: Real-time weather updates, Dark/Light Mode Toggle, Interactive charts, Search history, City favorites, Clean and responsive UI.
Tech Stack: Next.js, React.js, TypeScript, TanStack Query, Shadcn UI, Recharts, Tailwind CSS.
Live Preview: https://mausam-weather.vercel.app/

projects_portfolio.name: SmartSpend
projects_portfolio.description:
SmartSpend is a robust Budget Tracker application designed to simplify personal finance management. Built using Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma, and Tailwind CSS.

Key Features: Transaction Management, Category Insights, Historical Data, Interactive Visuals, Secure Authentication, Dynamic Dashboards, Custom Date Filtering, Elegant UI.
Tech Stack: Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma ORM, TanStack Query, Recharts, Clerk, Tailwind CSS.
Live Preview: https://smartspend-budget.vercel.app/

projects_portfolio.name: Personal Portfolio
projects_portfolio.description:
Personal Portfolio project built with Next.js, MongoDB, NextAuth, Cloudinary, Chart.js.

Backend: Secure Authentication, Scalable Data Storage, Optimized Media Management, Real-Time Analytics, Modular Architecture.
Frontend: Dynamic Routing, Blog Section with Interactive Features, SSG & SSR, Fully Responsive Design, Efficient State Management, CSS Modules, Engaging Data Visualizations, Smooth Transitions & Animations, Accessibility First.
Learning Outcomes: Fast, user-centric applications, type safety, responsive design, performance optimization, interactive features.
Live Demo: https://diwanportfolio.vercel.app

projects_portfolio.name: TalentTrek
projects_portfolio.description:
TalentTrek (Interns Store) is an innovative web application designed to connect ambitious students with outstanding internship opportunities. API-driven job listings, student profiles, advanced search & filters, real-time notifications, responsive web design.
Tech Stack: React, TypeScript (TSX), Tailwind CSS, API integration, UI/UX Design.
Live Demo: https://talent-trek.vercel.app

content_chunks.title: Name and Identity
content_chunks.content: My name is Diwan Malla. When you ask 'what is your name?' or 'who are you?', the answer is Diwan Malla. I am Diwan Malla, a Full-Stack Developer based in Sydney, Australia. I'm passionate about creating high-performance, intuitive user interfaces and AI-powered web applications. Remember: my name is Diwan Malla.

content_chunks.title: Personal Summary
content_chunks.content: Full Stack developer specializing in React.js, Material UI, and UX-driven design. Certified IBM Full Stack Development and Meta Front-End Specialization. Experienced in building responsive web applications, improving UI performance, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional digital experiences.

content_chunks.title: Experience Level and Career Stage
content_chunks.content: Mid-Level Full-Stack Developer with 4+ years professional experience. Appropriate for Mid-Level to Senior Developer roles, not junior positions. Salary expectations: $95k-$115k AUD for mid-level, $115k-$135k for senior roles. Have led teams, implemented CI/CD, and delivered multiple production applications.

content_chunks.title: Salary and Location Preferences
content_chunks.content: Current salary: $85k-$95k AUD. Expectations: $95k-$115k for mid-level, $115k-$135k for senior roles. Based in Sydney, open to remote work, hybrid, or relocation within Australia (Sydney, Newcastle, Central Coast, Brisbane, Gold Coast, Canberra). International student, immediate to work, happy to volunteer. 3+ years remote experience. Available to start immediately. Open to 25% interstate travel.

content_chunks.title: Primary Technology Stack
content_chunks.content: Expert in React 19, Next.js 15, TypeScript, JavaScript ES6+, Node.js, Express. Advanced in PostgreSQL, MongoDB, AWS, Material UI, Tailwind CSS. Production experience with Python Flask, REST APIs, CI/CD, GitHub Actions. Strong UI/UX with Figma, responsive design, accessibility.

content_chunks.title: Technology Adaptation and Learning
content_chunks.content: Open to learning C#, .NET, and Angular for the right role with mentorship. SQL Server knowledge transferable from PostgreSQL/MySQL experience. Fast learner: mastered Next.js 13 in 2 weeks, TypeScript in 6 weeks, built RAG system in 3 weeks. Proven track record of rapid technology adoption. Typically productive in new frameworks within 4-6 weeks.

content_chunks.title: Barnamala Tech Experience
content_chunks.content: Full-Stack Developer at Barnamala Tech (Feb 2025-Present). Improved UI load speed by 35%, user satisfaction by 28%, reduced component development time by 50% through reusable component library. Automated deployment reducing time by 40% (4h to 2.4h), eliminated 95% deployment bugs. Led team of 2 developers, mentored on React best practices. Skills: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Material UI, Python Flask, MongoDB, AWS, GitHub Actions, CI/CD.

content_chunks.title: Hamro Chautari Experience
content_chunks.content: Junior Web Developer at Hamro Chautari (April 2023-Nov 2024). Boosted engagement by 25%, reduced load time by 40%, improved Lighthouse score from 65 to 92. Optimized database queries (3s to 0.5s response time), implemented Redis caching. Built design system for consistency. Skills: React 18, Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, AWS, Vercel, Redis.

content_chunks.title: Bihani Tech Experience
content_chunks.content: Front-End Web Developer at Bihani Tech (Sep 2021-Aug 2022). Improved UI satisfaction by 35% with React.js and Bootstrap. Built responsive web applications and customized WordPress sites. Skills: JavaScript, React.js, Bootstrap, WordPress, REST APIs.

content_chunks.title: Adira Tech Internship
content_chunks.content: Web Developer Intern at Adira Tech (Nov 2020-Jul 2021). Debugged UI issues and supported Agile development. Built internal projects with JavaScript and Bootstrap. Gained hands-on experience with version control and collaborative development.

content_chunks.title: Job Tracker Project
content_chunks.content: Built full-stack job tracking platform with analytics dashboard and secure document management (Oct 2025). Impact: 10+ active users, streamlined resume/cover letter management. Technologies: Next.js 15, PostgreSQL, Vercel Blob Storage, React, TypeScript.

content_chunks.title: PDFly Project
content_chunks.content: Developed PDF APIs for secure processing and file encryption (Aug-Oct 2025). Impact: 100+ documents processed daily, improved user satisfaction by 45%. Technologies: Python, React, API development.

content_chunks.title: SangeetX Project
content_chunks.content: Built music streaming platform with admin dashboard (July-Sep 2025). Impact: 50+ users, reduced admin time by 60%, improved media loading speed by 50%. Technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, Cloudinary, streaming optimization.

content_chunks.title: BrainiX Project - AI Leadership
content_chunks.content: Led 3-member development team building AI-powered LMS with real-time chat and Stripe payments (Feb-June 2025). Impact: 300% engagement increase, 94.7% course completion rate. Integrated OpenAI APIs, Pusher real-time features. Demonstrated technical leadership and AI integration expertise. Technologies: Next.js, React, OpenAI APIs, Pusher, Stripe API.

content_chunks.title: Technical Skills Overview
content_chunks.content: Frontend Expert: React 19, Next.js 15, TypeScript, JavaScript ES6+, Material UI, Tailwind CSS, Redux. Backend Advanced: Node.js, Express, Python Flask, REST APIs. Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis. Cloud/DevOps: AWS (S3, EC2, Lambda), GitHub Actions, CI/CD, Docker. UI/UX: Figma, Adobe XD, Responsive Design, Accessibility WCAG, Design Systems. Testing: Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress.

content_chunks.title: Soft Skills and Leadership
content_chunks.content: Agile workflow (Scrum, Kanban), UX research, wireframing, prototyping, cross-functional collaboration, technical mentoring, code reviews, documentation. Led teams of 2-3 developers, mentored junior developers on React and TypeScript best practices. Strong communication and stakeholder management.

content_chunks.title: Education
content_chunks.content: Bachelor of Information Technology, Victoria University Sydney, 2025, Sydney, Australia. Passed HD 82% 6.67/7 GPA. Certifications: IBM Full Stack Developer (2024), Meta Front-End Specialization (2023, 2024). Master of Information Technology, Sydney Met, major Data Science, 2026-2028.

content_chunks.title: Career Goals and Role Preferences
content_chunks.content: Current level: Mid-Level Full-Stack Developer (4+ years). Target: Senior Developer or Technical Lead within 2-3 years. Ideal roles: Senior Full-Stack Developer, Technical Lead (React/Node.js), AI Integration Engineer. Open to mid-level roles with clear advancement path. NOT interested in junior roles. Focused on React/Next.js ecosystem, SaaS platforms, AI/ML integration. Industries: SaaS, AI/ML, Enterprise, FinTech, EdTech.

content_chunks.title: Learning Agility and Technology Adoption
content_chunks.content: Fast learner with proven track record: Next.js 13 App Router production-ready in 2 weeks, TypeScript team expert in 6 weeks, OpenAI RAG system in 3 weeks, Material UI mastery in 4 weeks. Methodology: learn by building, thorough documentation reading, community engagement, teaching others. Currently learning: AI/ML patterns, LangChain, system design. Open to C#/.NET/Angular with mentorship support.
